author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body: It was dumb to submit this PR during JuliaCon!
Why? Should I not merge it?
Oh please do!  I just meant that everyone was busy there!

I've created release `v0.1.0`, [here](https://github.com/JeffFessler/MIRTio.jl/releases/tag/v0.1.0) it is.
<!-- ca88fc40-b13c-11e9-9f89-25ffcb8247f9 -->
